page.title: 19MISS MARGARET BLYTHE
page.content: Miss Blythe is ex_chairman of the Frodsham Parish Council.She handed over the chain of office after her one year to Mr.Astbury.Miss Blythe told us that the council meets twice a month to discuss issues relating to the area such as footpaths,litter and play areas.Miss Blythe enjoyed her year in office but found it hardwork and is now having a well earned rest.She is still very busy working in the village She is a keen gardener and produces all her own vegetables.Miss Blythe is a non_driver and so keeps fit by walking.This is easy as she lives at the top of Frodsham Hill.Miss Blythe has lived all her life in Frodsham and was educated at the old infants school and Frodsham Girls School before going to convent school in Chester.She enjoys watching sport on television particularly snooker and rugby.
